column5: Sometimes.
ty
We've just received a note from the website hosts saying that it was definitely a hardware failure and that all should be stable now.
roy: does this mean i have to pick up all the pieces of my hard drive now cause it wasnt just my comp?
Skeets step away from the computer....put the screwdriver away.
Seems to be flying along now. Thanks!
at least for me it is incredibly incredibly slow loading in  anyone else  every other site seems fine
SLOW!!! - takes 6 or 8 tries to even get on!   Don
i am having the same issue
Crazy. I was reading a thread,then puff,no connection.  This is not good for the best Ontario fishing/outdoors/hunting site.
I'm only finding it slow when it's actually working.....
and that's why I thought it would be good to let them know  10-4
I just checked with Roy, via e-mail and he has let them know Terry.
Been super slow since it blew up earlier this week.
Very good point Chris. Last night I gave up trying, just painfully slow today, as it has been for quite a while
I forgot what dial-up was like!
it pooped the bed on me 90% of the time I tried to get on today...
I have been getting this almost 50% of the time when trying to post...  "Oops! Google Chrome could not connect to www.ofncommunity.com"  It's to a point where I'm spending time elsewhere.  Bob
I feal like the rabbit in the hat. Sometimes he comes out,other times he dosent. Ok this is three times in the last 7 minutes I got booted out.
Maybe the hamster needs feeding.

I think the sites servers have cabin fever  <embed width="600" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowFullscreen="true" allowNetworking="all" wmode="transparent" src="http://static.photobucket.com/player.swf" flashvars="file=http%3A%2F%2Fvid25.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Fc52%2FMrbeee1954%2Fofnfever.mp4">
This is what happens when you move to a tiller server.
Kinda frustrating just browsing here now.
Looks like it's time to play solitaire....
Not to worry. If this keeps up much longer, we will give everyone a full (or partial) refund.
Yep, definitely should have gotten the console.    I'll put my refund back into the pot Dan;)
I never realized just how much time I was spending on here until the last week happened.
I was too tired to get frustrated last night. After the second poop-out I crashed.
pm,s working?
Everythings fine so far! The only time Im having issues is if Im playing mafia wars! Then go to OFC! Then things go for the carper!
